org.zaproxy.zap.extension.authorization

Class BasicAuthorizationDetectionMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.extension.authorization.BasicAuthorizationDetectionMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationDetectionMethod

    public class BasicAuthorizationDetectionMethod
extends Object
implements AuthorizationDetectionMethod
    A simple authorization detection method based on matching the status code of the response and identifying patterns in the response's body and header.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BasicAuthorizationDetectionMethod.LogicalOperator
      Defines how the conditions are composed one with another to obtain the final result.

      • loadMethodFromSession

        public static BasicAuthorizationDetectionMethod loadMethodFromSession(Session session,
                                                      int contextId)
                                                               throws DatabaseException
        Creates a BasicAuthorizationDetectionMethod object based on data loaded from the session database for a given context. For proper results, data should have been saved to the session using the persistMethodToSession(Session, int) method.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if an error occurred while reading from the database
